speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm okay, thanks. What is this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I understand your concern. I'm calling regarding your account with City Credit. Can you please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. Can you also confirm your current address?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for confirming your details. You have an outstanding balance of $250. How would you like to proceed with the payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I can pay $100 right now and the rest later.

speaker: Agent
text: That sounds reasonable. I can set that up for you. When would you like to make the remaining payment?

speaker: Customer
text: I’ll pay the rest next Friday.

speaker: Agent
text: Great, I will note that down. Thank you for your cooperation today.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you, Mark. I appreciate your help.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a great day.
